short_summary: Advance Contract Award Notice, Procurement Category: Goods
description: The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) requires one (1) AC (alternating current) load bank to be installed at the NRC facility in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada which should be technically similar to ASCO 6113 load bank installed in the NRC facility in Vancouver, British Columbia.
full_summary:
**Load Bank for Testing Variable Speed Generator**
==============================================

**Tender Reference:** cb-733-72331460
**Solicitation Number:** 24-58093
**Publication Date:** 2024-07-08
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-25 14:00:00

**Objective:**
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking to procure a load bank for testing a variable speed generator. The load bank must be able to simulate the electrical load on the generator and meet the technical requirements listed below.

**Technical Requirements:**
The load bank must be similar to the ASCO 6113 load bank installed at the NRC facility in Vancouver, British Columbia. The tenderer must provide a load bank that meets the following technical specifications:

* Measuring and testing instruments
* Electrical measuring and testing equipment and accessories
* Product testing

**Contract Details:**
* **Contract Duration:** 2024-07-26 to 2025-02-28
* **Contracting Entity:** National Research Council of Canada
* **Contact Information:**
  - Name: Mike Cox
  - Email: Michael.Cox2@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
  - Phone: 587337-7046

**Notice and Attachments:**
The complete tender notice and attachments can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41814/24-58093_acan_load-bank_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41814/24-58093_acan_load-bank_en.pdf)

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:**
This tender is open to bidders across Canada. The load bank must be delivered to the NRC facility in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.  Please note that the contract has been cancelled and is no longer active. There will be no responses to inquiries.
==============================================
